728770f-b.title: Richmond: Clove Road - Hylan Boulevard
728770f-b.text:
(1)
Clove Road, east from Hylan Boulevard. The road turns northward
at about Winfield Ave.
April 22, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A view northward across the road, from a point east of Hylan
Boulevard.
April 22, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
